record.description: “See the Bird-e-e-e-e!” Marion Moses poses for a rogues’ gallery picture before entering the gray towers of the Midway campus. William F. Davies clicks his camera monotonously, as he has done a thousand times before. It is the regular routine at the University of Chicago during Freshman week, which began yesterday. Miss Moses was the thirteenth freshman to register this year. The photographs are placed on file at the university.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
